pp1.3:6.1_0: Arukūpamacitto puggalo, vijjūpamacitto puggalo, vajirūpamacitto puggalo.
pp1.3:8.1_0: Avakujjapañño puggalo, ucchaṅgapañño puggalo, puthupañño puggalo.
pp1.3:9.1_0: Atthekacco puggalo kāmesu ca bhavesu ca avītarāgo,
pp1.3:9.1_1: atthekacco puggalo kāmesu vītarāgo bhavesu avītarāgo,
pp1.3:9.1_2: atthekacco puggalo kāmesu ca bhavesu ca vītarāgo.
pp1.3:10.1_0: Pāsāṇalekhūpamo puggalo, pathavilekhūpamo puggalo, udakalekhūpamo puggalo.
pp1.3:14.1_0: Atthekacco puggalo na sevitabbo na bhajitabbo na payirupāsitabbo,
pp1.3:14.1_2: atthekacco puggalo sakkatvā garuṁ katvā sevitabbo bhajitabbo payirupāsitabbo.
pp1.3:15.1_0: Atthekacco puggalo jigucchitabbo na sevitabbo na bhajitabbo na payirupāsitabbo,
pp1.3:15.1_1: atthekacco puggalo ajjhupekkhitabbo na sevitabbo na bhajitabbo na payirupāsitabbo;
pp1.3:16.1_0: Atthekacco puggalo sīlesu paripūrakārī, samādhismiṁ mattaso kārī, paññāya mattaso kārī;
pp1.3:16.2_0: atthekacco puggalo sīlesu ca paripūrakārī, samādhismiñca paripūrakārī, paññāya mattaso kārī;
pp1.3:16.3_0: atthekacco puggalo sīlesu ca paripūrakārī, samādhismiñca paripūrakārī, paññāya ca paripūrakārī.
